item.title: Mathematica Provides Great PlotTheme Options
item.description: Amazingly, Mathematica provides an option for plot that automatically generates beautiful plots.

item.title: Turn a Series Expansion into Function in Mathematica
item.description: Turn a series expansion in Mathematica into a function

item.title: How to Run Mathematica Script in Terminal
item.description: Using math -run or wolfram -run we could execute a Mathematica script through ssh in terminal.

item.title: Mathematica Exclude Singularities in Plot
item.description: Mathematica Plot might include some non-existant lines sometimes, Exclusions is the potion for it.

item.title: Passing Function Arguments Through Lists in Mathematica
item.description: We can pass a list of arguments using Sequence

item.title: Mathematica Different Output Forms
item.description: Mathematica has many different output forms. Understanding them is extremely helpful when making plots.
